amendment.description: At the end of the bill, insert the following: SEC. 3. APPLICATION. The withdrawal under section 2 of this Act shall not apply to any Federal land depicted on the Map as "Federal Mineral Estate to be Withdrawn" located in the 4th Congressional District of Arizona, as configured on the date of enactment of this Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part C of House Report 116-264 to exclude lands in the 4th Congressional District of Arizona from the permanent mineral withdrawal under the Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 243 (Roll no. 599).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 243 (Roll no. 599).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Gosar.
